item.title: Bank of America hikes Eli Lilly price target on promising drug pipeline
item.description: Bank of America's new price target has shares of Eli Lilly climbing 22% from here.

item.title: Holiday shopping season kicks off with a solid start. Here are the big winners
item.description: Omnichannel retailers and a couple of beauty names look to be the biggest beneficiaries of Black Friday spending this year, according to analysts.

item.title: This stock tied to U.S. housing could be in trouble. How to make money on potential declines through options
item.description: Michael Khouw explains why selling calls on this name makes sense.

item.title: Josh Brown bought this tech stock when he was a retail broker decades ago. Now it's back on his radar
item.description: Josh and Sean revisit their Morgan Stanley play and also give two new names on the Best Stocks list.

item.title: NYSE insider Jay Woods on the stocks to watch this week, including a retail turnaround story
item.description: Jay Woods gives Pro subscribers the rundown on the week ahead from the NYSE.
